original_text: Then Festus, when he had conferred with the council, answered, Hast thou appealed unto Caesar? unto Caesar shalt thou go.
korean_text: 베스도가 배석자들과 상의하고 이르되 네가 가이사에게 상소하였으니 가이사에게 갈 것이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then Festus, when he had conferred with council, answered
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 베스투스는 의회와 협의한 후에 대답하니
